main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Troy, Ohio, on January 3, 1961.
interesting points: The object was described as bright, shiny, and white in color.,It was seen flying fast and straight before disappearing into the distance.,The observation lasted for approximately 2-3 minutes.,Only one object was reported by the witness.,The report suggests the possibility that the witnesses saw a high-flying aircraft, though details remained unclear.
witness description: There was one witness to the sighting.
